person.persName: Theodore Dehon Rand (Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, soldier and attorney)

body.p: Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, soldier and attorney. Philadelphia native. Married to Margarette Emma Belrose in 1864. Educated at the Episcopal Academy in Philadelphia. Educated at the Polytechnic College. Served in Landis' Independent Battery of Pennsylvania Light Artillery. Attorney in Philadelphia in 1860. Attorney at Bullitt & Fairthorne in 1865.
